insert.foreach: INSERT INTO BOOK (BOOK_NO, BOOK_ISBN ,BOOK_TITLE, BOOK_AUTHOR, BOOK_PUBLISHER, BOOK_PUBDATE, BOOK_DESCRIPTION, BOOK_IMAGE, BOOK_FIELD) VALUES (BOOK_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{book.bookIsbn}, #{book.bookTitle}, #{book.bookAuthor}, #{book.bookPublisher}, #{book.bookPubdate}, #{book.bookDescription}, #{book.bookImage}, #{book.bookField})

mapper.select: SELECT BOOK_NO, BOOK_ISBN ,BOOK_TITLE, BOOK_AUTHOR, BOOK_PUBLISHER, BOOK_PUBDATE, BOOK_DESCRIPTION, BOOK_IMAGE, BOOK_FIELD FROM BOOK WHERE ${column} LIKE '%' || #{query} || '%'
